subject: p12185775
Impression: AP chest compared to : Small-to-moderate left pleural effusion has increased slightly over the past several days. Moderate enlargement of the cardiac silhouette accompanied by mediastinal vascular engorgement is also slightly more pronounced. Pulmonary vasculature is engorged but there is no edema. Consolidation has been present without appreciable change in the left lower lobe since at least. Mediastinum widened at the thoracic inlet by a combination of tortuous vessels and mediastinal fat deposition. Right jugular introducer ends just above the junction with left brachiocephalic vein.
